option.name: originalContent
option.value:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
echo "Starting LocalStack deployment..."
# Deploy without timeout but with more verbose output aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation deploy \ --stack-name patient-management \ --template-file "./cdk.out/localstack.template.json" \ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM \ --no-fail-on-empty-changeset \ --region us-east-1 \ --debug 2>&1 | head -50 # Show first 50 lines of debug output
echo "Checking deployment status..." aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation describe-stacks \ --stack-name patient-management \ --region us-east-1 || echo "Stack doesn't exist yet"
echo "Deployment completed!"

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
#!/bin/bash
set -e
# Disable AWS CLI pager to prevent commands from opening in a separate viewer export AWS_PAGER=""
echo "Starting LocalStack deployment..."
# Deploy the CloudFormation stack aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation deploy \ --stack-name patient-management \ --template-file "./cdk.out/localstack.template.json" \ --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM \ --no-fail-on-empty-changeset \ --region us-east-1 \ --no-paginate
echo "Checking deployment status..." aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation describe-stacks \ --stack-name patient-management \ --region us-east-1 \ --no-paginate
echo "Attempting to get load balancer DNS name..." aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 elbv2 describe-load-balancers \ --region us-east-1 \ --query "LoadBalancers[0].DNSName" \ --output text \ --no-paginate || echo "No load balancers found"
echo "Deployment completed!"

option.name: updatedContent
